name: Last Sin (Demo)
description:
Last Sin

Last Sin is an action platformer where you play as Nekro a disciple of lord death. You are set out on a journey to save the world from Meka one of death's older disciples. He has reeked chaos on the world and you are it's last hope. Can you save the world?

Controls

Movement: W,A,S,D | Attack: Left Mouse Click | Reload: R| Secondary Attack: Right Mouse Click | Jump: Space | Pause: Tab | Dash: Jump first then hit Left Shift

This version of Last Sin is a demo and is NOT THE COMPLETE GAME!
Please provide feedback on the game. Depending on the feedback will determine where I take this project Thank you!
